alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 09 at 3:22PM MDT until September 09 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CUSTER AND NORTH CENTRAL FALL RIVER COUNTIES... At 322 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cold Brook Reservoir, or near Hot Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs, Buffalo Gap, Cottonwood Springs Dam, Maverick Junction, Cold Brook Reservoir, northwestern Angostura Reservoir, and southwestern Wind Cave National Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
